DATA_COLLECTION.LABEL: This data was collected in an automated process. Learn more.

DATA_COLLECTION.TITLE: Data collection
DATA_COLLECTION.BODY: The data was collected in an automated process within the context of a project. AI was used to analyse the stakeholder's website and identify potentially relevant Sustainable Development Goals. The assigned Sustainable Development Goals should therefore be regarded as a starting point and do not necessarily present an exhaustive list. Only publicly available data was used for the analysis.
